title: Ranked play
body:
League of legends decided to drop me from 
Platinum 4 to Silver 3 after placement games 
I mean wtf, how is that even possible
So I email them and ask can you just reset it or something that's not right, I have spend 2 seasons climbing up and staying up and they reset me back to silver
They reply with

replies.body: Shouldn't really matter you should be able to get plta bck easily l0l

I went about 8/2, loss to win and 3 of those games were 4v5s 

But that isnt the point 

I WENT FROM PLAT TO SILVER 

That should not be possible 

I cant even play with my friends anymore, they are all still in plat

Well there you go. You go 2-8 and expect higher than Silver?

Your MMR was probably already lowish considering your record before the new season started. You had like a 35-40% winrate in the games before the  new season so your MMR was getting low. That along with the soft reset which lowers anyone above silver MMR even more, plus doing very poor in placements means mid-high silver.

If I were you i'd probably be annoyed to not be atleast gold, but if your a plat player, you should be out of silver in a couple days.
Before your provisionals your MMR was around 1600, which is mid/low Gold if I'm not mistaken. Then add in the losses you sustained during your provisionals and that brought you down into Silver.
What did you get in your placements. But dude you gotta remember that these hit hard for alot of people, i went 5/5 and went from g4 to s4.

I won 8/10 and went from Bronze 4 to Bronze 4.

Look. Your rating isn't your MMR. I've played several games, losing at 0 lp at Bronze 4 without dropping to Bronze 5. Why you ask? Because my MMR is still higher than a Bronze 5 level, so Riot doesn't think I belong in Bronze 5. If you truly belong in Platinum, your LP gains/losses will speak for themselves, they set everyone back, there's challengers in platinum 1 because that's the highest you could come out of provisionals (being diamond 2+ to challenger and having won all provisionals), but they all have challenger mmr, meaning they're going to be versing other ex-challengers with the same MMR for the title.

 The reset was just a drop (for everyone), that 2 season wait wasn't a farm fest, your WoW account didn't get hacked, it was training, you've come a long way to do what you do now, and the last game you had will have had the same purpose your 50th game did, use the skills you've learned along the way and you should soon be in the division you deserve.
